bike.description: 6061 triple gauge aluminum main tubes and stays, sloping design, rack/fender mounts, forged dropouts with double eyelets
paint_description: M: Silver Moon or Ano Black; F: Silver Moon or Ano Blue

components.description: Hi-tensile steel unicrown, radiused blades, double dropout eyelets
Alex ID-19 double wall alloy rims with GSW sidewall, 36H, Formula alloy hubs with QR and 14g stainless steel spokes
CST Marathon/Tour with silver safety stripe, 700 x 32c
Forged alloy crank, single 42T chainring, 170mm, with full length chainguard
Comfort platform with TPE non-slip insert
Jamis ARC, 6061 aluminum, 25.4 x 27JAMIS_DEGREE sweep x 580mm
NVO Components TM-4 adjustable threadless system (ATS) forged aluminum stem, 10JAMIS_DEGREE x 90mm (14/15/16/17/18"), 105mm (19/21"), 115mm (23")
Anatomic double density kraton grip with end plug
Jamis alloy micro-adjust, 27.2 x 350mm with alloy clamp and QR seatpin
Jamis Metro Sport with memory foam, synthetic leather cover, burnished sides and bumper springs with satin steel rails, gender specific
SLIDEPAD Single lever automatic braking system, linear pull brakes with Tektro CL530 ergonomic designed alloy brake levers with kraton insert
